adDetails: Summer Savings Special-Our Lowest Prices-Yovani's Marin Landscaping (Marin County) Please contact Yovani's Marin Landscaping for special. Please see details below. Thanks Some of the services we offer under the special: -general yard clean-up -hand weeding and weed whacking -lawn mowing -storm clean-up -gutter cleaning -hedge trimming and topping -light hauling of yard waste (dump fees where applicable) -leaf blowing/raking We also do hillside weeding. lot clearing, blackberry and ivy, scotch broom, brush removal, weed control, special poison oak removing and hauling, mowing and edging, tree pruning, trimming and topping, fertilizing, sprinkler installation and repair, re-seeding, new yard, new lawn sod or seeding. Residential and Commercial Service. Yovani's Marin Landscaping is #1 with pricing, customer service and professionalism. We have been serving Marin since the last century. We were just given a 40 house landscaping contract in San Francisco. So we are now serving San Francisco. Marin Landscaping gives Free Estimates and in writting. We want to earn you business and keep it with our low pricing and quality of our work. That is why we are #1. Thanks! Customer satisfaction is our number one goal at Yovan's Marin Landscaping. We pride ourselves at being able to offer our customers the very best value service. Please call for free estimates. We often amaze our customers by the high level of service we are able to provide at such reasonable prices. That is what we are all about. Regular Maintenance Service (Once, Twice Month or Weekly) It is up to you. We work within your budget. Clean-Up Yard & Hauling, tree cutting. We have full size trucks and all the tools needed for Gardening, Planting, Lawn Care, General Repair-Fixing, Mulching, Fertilizing, Weeding etc. No job too small or too big for us.
